author: Amy McConnell, MBA
title: Belvoir Federal Raised Hundreds to Support Children’s Miracle Network on Miracle Jeans Day
text:
Belvoir Federal Credit Union raised $907 in recognition of Miracle Jeans Day which supports the Children’s Miracle Network. This national event promotes awareness of the Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals in an effort to raise funds for the children treated at their facilities. Every minute, 62 children enter a Children’s Miracle Network Hospital for treatment. With the aid of national events, like Miracle Jeans Day, contributors are able to help provide comfort, treatment, and hope to millions of sick kids.
At Belvoir Federal, the employees came together as the “Belvoir Believers” to make personal donations to this cause and wear jeans throughout the week to show their support.
The credit union created a team micro-site through the Miracle Jeans Day Website where employees could donate funds directly online. The monetary goal for the event was achieved with 113% of the objective being met. One hundred percent of the donations will be made to the local Children’s Miracle Network Hospital.
About Children’s Miracle Network Hospital
Since 1983 Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals have raised more than $5 billion, most of which was a $1 at a time. The money was given to over 160 children’s hospitals across the United States and Canada. The donations support research and training, purchase equipment, and pay for uncompensated care, all of which go to save and improve the lives of as many children as possible. For more information, visit http://give.childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.org .
About Belvoir Federal Credit Union
Belvoir Federal is a member-owned, full-service financial institution that provides the foundation for the financial success of our Members. Belvoir Federal, a not-for-profit organization, has served the Fort Belvoir and U.S. Armed Forces community since 1946 and named Best Places to Work in Virginia in 2014 and 2015. For more information about Belvoir Federal, please visit http://www.BelvoirCreditUnion.org .
